column2: The Cult of the Dragon possesses great repositories of secret lore. As a member, you can lose yourself into the pursuit of higher knowledge.
Study the hidden lore of the cult.
The Cult has connections and often makes alliances with dragons, which means that many unusual magic items end of in the Cult's possession. Loyal servants may be rewarded with such items.
The Cult has great knowledge, collected, preserved and kept from the world for centuries. You now have the unique chance to study that secret lore.
After months of studying dusty tomes and frayed parchments, you might be on the verge of a great discovery. Do you have the courage to press on?
Of course, nothing will stop me.
The Cult has decided to accept your request, and a magic artifact of sizable power will soon be entrusted to you.
